import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react'; import './CSS/dash.css'; import Ellipse from "../assests/Ellipse 1.png"; import line1 from "../assests/Line 1.png"; import line2 from "../assests/Line 2.png"; import line3 from "../assests/Line 3.png"; import rect1 from "../assests/rect1.jpg"; import rect2 from "../assests/rect2.jpg"; function Dashboard({User, Email}) { var [date,setDate] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { var timer = setInterval(()=>setDate(new Date()), 1000 ) return function cleanup() { clearInterval(timer) } }); const OnPageLoad = () => { localStorage.setItem("User", User); localStorage.setItem("Email", Email); } return ( <>

Welcome, {User} Today is {date.toLocaleString()}

Personal Finance Portfolio

Holdings

Value

Stocks

Mutual Funds

Health Insurance

Rs XXXX

Rs XXXX

Rs XXXX

10%

73%

23%

Investment Planning

Tax Planning
) }; export default Dashboard;
